course_title: Senior Seminar: Current Events & Business Impact
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 55 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Class Dates: 9/13, 9/20, 10/18, 10/25, 11/1, alternate date: 11/15 (please note that the alternate dates will only be used if the instructor or school needs to cancel one of the regularly scheduled dates.  They are not makeup sessions for missed classes).
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
